original_text: So Jacob served seven years for Rachel, and they seemed to him but a few days because of the love he had for her.
korean_text: 야곱이 라헬을 위하여 칠 년 동안 라반을 섬겼으나 그를 사랑하는 까닭에 칠 년을 며칠 같이 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: So Jacob served seven years for Rachel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 야곱은 라헬을 위해 칠 년을 섬겼는데,

sentences.original_text: and they seemed to him but a few days
because of the love he had for her.
